name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Stackers
description: A Tiny Toon themed drop-down puzzle game comparable to Tetris and Columns. The player has to create clusters of equally colored eggs which cause explosive chain reactions, trying to clear the screen. Playable against computer or against up to four human competitors via Link Cable. Particularly effective moves cause additional elements to be send to the other players screens. The player can also invoke special moves to be executed by Tiny Toon characters by collecting coins.

shot.caption: Choose what kind of game you would like to play
Puzzle mode has these three difficulty levels
Survival mode has these three standard difficulty levels
The eggs are falling from the sky!  Get ready!
Completing a puzzle doesn't make him happy
If you don't solve the puzzle in the right number of turns, you get this continue screen
How would you like your eggs?  I like mine colored.
These large eggs are made with 4 small eggs of the same color set up into a square.  Breaking a large egg gets you an "A" on the left which can be used to clear a screen.
Playing against a computer player... be careful of their "A" pieces... they can make things difficult with those.  You can do the same to them, of course
Using your "A" pieces to clear your board of all eggs by washing them away
The computer opponent used her "A" pieces to make all my blocks frozen so they don't match other eggs' colors
